an6.103:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, anisamse sampassamanena alameva bhikkhuna sabbasankharesu anodhim karitva dukkhasannam upatthapetum.
an6.103:1.3: ‘Sabbasankharesu ca me nibbidasanna paccupatthita bhavissati, seyyathapi ukkhittasike vadhake.
an6.103:1.4: Sabbaloka ca me mano vutthahissati, nibbane ca santadassavi bhavissami, anusaya ca me samugghatam gacchissanti, kiccakari ca bhavissami, sattha ca me paricinno bhavissati mettavataya’ti.
an6.103:1.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha anisamse sampassamanena alameva bhikkhuna sabbasankharesu anodhim karitva dukkhasannam upatthapetun”ti.
